results.title: Metformin: A Prospective Alternative for the Treatment of Chronic Pain
results.text_hl: Regarding @DISEASE_Neuralgia @DISEASE_MESH:D009437 @@@neuropathic pain@@@, there is no studies showing the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve injury@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@/@DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@.

results.title: Effects of metformin on behavioral alterations produced by chronic sucrose consumption in male rats.
results.text_hl: In the EPM, SUC animals spent more time in the open arms and less time in the central square. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment prevented the decreased @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ observed in SUC animals in the OF and EPM.

results.title: Environmental Enrichment and Metformin Combination Improves Cognitive Function through BDNF and HPA Axis in Chronically Stressed Rats.
results.text_hl: This study aims to evaluate the effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an enriched environment (EE), and its combination in alleviating @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@-like behaviours, @DISEASE_Memory_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory impairments@@@, and metabolic changes.
